text: Area codes 204, 431, and 584 is are area codes for Manitoba. Area code 204 was one of the initial area codes created in 1947. It covers the entire province of Manitoba. It was overlaid by area code 431 in 2012 and overlaid by 584 on October 29, 2022. Category:Manitoba Category:Area codes in Canada
title: Area codes 204, 431, and 584
